chart_metadata.name: restreamer
chart_metadata.description: Allows smart free video streaming in real time.

groups.name: Container Image
groups.description: Image to be used for container

groups.name: Networking and Services
groups.description: Configure Network and Services for Container

groups.name: Storage and Persistence
groups.description: Persist and Share Data that is Separate from the Container

groups.name: Resources and Devices
groups.description: Specify Resources/Devices to be Allocated to Workload

attrs.label: Stop All
attrs.description: Stops All Running pods and hibernates cnpg

attrs.label: Replicas (Advanced)
attrs.description: Set the number of Replicas

attrs.label: Extra Environment Variables
attrs.description: Please be aware that some variables are set in the background, adding duplicates here might cause issues or prevent the app from starting...

attrs.label: Show Advanced Settings
attrs.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

attrs.label: Hostname
attrs.description: Set to the domain name of the host this instance is running on.

attrs.label: Host Auto
attrs.description: Enable detection of public IP addresses.

attrs.label: TLS Enable
attrs.description: Set to true to enable TLS support.

attrs.label: Origins
attrs.description: List of allowed CORS origins. Will be used for / and /memfs.

attrs.label: Mime Types File
attrs.description: Path to file with MIME type definitions.

attrs.label: API Auth Username
attrs.description: Username for auth

attrs.label: API Auth Password
attrs.description: Password for auth.

attrs.label: API Read Only
attrs.description: Allow only ready only access to the API

attrs.label: API Access HTTP Allow
attrs.description: List of IP ranges in CIDR notation

attrs.label: API Access HTTP Block
attrs.description: List of IP ranges in CIDR notation

attrs.label: API Access HTTPS Allow
attrs.description: List of IP ranges in CIDR notation

attrs.label: API Access HTTPS Block
attrs.description: List of IP ranges in CIDR notation

attrs.label: API Auth Enable
attrs.description: Set to false to disable auth for all clients.

attrs.label: API Auth Disable Localhost
attrs.description: Set to true to disable auth for clients from localhost.

attrs.label: API Auth0 Enable
attrs.description: Enable Auth0.

attrs.label: API Auth0 Tenants
attrs.description: List of base64 encoded Auth0 tenant JSON objects.

attrs.label: Storage Disk Max Size MByte
attrs.description: Max allowed megabytes for Disk Dir (0 for Unlimited)

attrs.label: Storage Disk Cache Enable
attrs.description: Enable cache for files Storage Disk

attrs.label: Storage Disk Cache Max Size MByte
attrs.description: Max allowed cache size. (0 for Unlimited)

attrs.label: Storage Disk Cache TTL Seconds
attrs.description: Seconds to keep files in cache.

attrs.label: Storage Disk Max File Size MBytes
attrs.description: Max. file size to put in cache. (0 for Unlimited)

attrs.label: Cache Types
attrs.description: List of file extensions to cache

attrs.label: Storage Memory Auth Enable
attrs.description: Enable basic auth for PUT,POST, and DELETE on /memfs.

attrs.label: Storage Memory Auth Username
attrs.description: Username for Basic-Auth of /memfs. Required if auth is enabled.

attrs.label: Storage Memory Auth Password
attrs.description: Password for Basic-Auth of /memfs. Required if auth is enabled.

attrs.label: Storage Memory Max Size MBytes
attrs.description: Max. allowed megabytes for /memfs. (0 for Unlimited)

attrs.label: Storage Memory Purge
attrs.description: Set to true to remove the oldest entries if the /memfs is full.

attrs.label: RTMP Enable
attrs.description: Enable RTMP server.

attrs.label: RTMPS Enable
attrs.description: Enable RTMP over TLS (Requires TLS to be enabled)

attrs.label: RTMP Token
attrs.description: RTMP token for publishing and playing. The token is the value of the URL query parameter token.

attrs.label: RTMP App
attrs.description: RTMP app for publishing.

attrs.label: FFMPEG Binary
attrs.description: Path to FFmpeg binary.

attrs.label: FFMPEG Max Processes
attrs.description: Max. allowed simultaneously running FFmpeg instances. (0 for unlimited.)

attrs.label: FFMPEG Access Input Allow
attrs.description: List of pattern for allowed input URI

attrs.label: FFMPEG Access Input Block
attrs.description: List of pattern for blocked input URI

attrs.label: FFMPEG Access Output Allow
attrs.description: List of pattern for allowed output URI

attrs.label: FFMPEG Access Output Block
attrs.description: List of pattern for blocked output URI

attrs.label: Playout Enable
attrs.description: Enable playout API where available

attrs.label: Playout Min Port
attrs.description: Min. port a playout server per input can run on.

attrs.label: Playout Max Port
attrs.description: Max. port a playout server per input can run on.

attrs.label: Log Topics
attrs.description: List of topics to log

attrs.label: Debug Profiling
attrs.description: Set to true to enable profiling endpoint on /profiling.

attrs.label: Debug Force GC
attrs.description: Number of seconds between forcing GC to return memory to the OS.

attrs.label: Metrics Enable
attrs.description: Enable collecting historic metrics data.

attrs.label: Prometheus Metrics Enable
attrs.description: Enable prometheus endpoint /metrics.

attrs.label: Metrics Range Seconds
attrs.description: Seconds to keep history metric data.

attrs.label: Metrics Interval Seconds
attrs.description: Interval for collecting metrics.

attrs.label: Sessions Enable
attrs.description: Enable HLS statistics for /memfs.

attrs.label: Session IP Ignore List
attrs.description: List of IP ranges in CIDR notation

attrs.label: Session Timeout Seconds
attrs.description: Timeout of a session in seconds.

attrs.label: Sessions Persist
attrs.description: Whether to persist the session history

attrs.label: Session Max Bitrate
attrs.description: Max. allowed outgoing bitrate in mbit/s. (0 for unlimited.)

attrs.label: Max Session
attrs.description: Max. allowed number of simultaneous sessions. (0 for unlimited.)

attrs.label: Blocked Prefixes
attrs.description: List of path prefixes that can't be routed.

attrs.label: Routes
attrs.description: List of route mappings of the form [from]:[to], e.g.

attrs.label: Main Service
attrs.description: The Primary service on which the healthcheck runs, often the webUI

attrs.label: Service Type
attrs.description: ClusterIP's are only internally available and Loadbalancer exposes the service using the system loadbalancer

attrs.description: MetalLB Only: Selects the Loadbalancer IP to expose on. Required when using PortalButton with MetalLB

attrs.description: This port exposes the container port on the service

attrs.label: App Config Storage
attrs.description: Stores the Application Configuration.

attrs.label: Type of Storage
attrs.description: Sets the persistence type, Anything other than PVC could break rollback!

attrs.label: Automatic Permissions Configuration
attrs.description: Automatically set permissions

subquestions.label: Run CHOWN
subquestions.description: It will run CHOWN on the path with the given fsGroup

subquestions.label: Run CHMOD
subquestions.description:
It will run CHMOD on the path with the given value</br>
Format should be 3 digits, e.g. 770

subquestions.label: Recursive
subquestions.description: It will run CHOWN and CHMOD recursively

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: Path inside the container the storage is mounted

attrs.label: Size quotum of Storage (Do NOT REDUCE after installation)
attrs.description: This value can ONLY be INCREASED after the installation

attrs.label: storageClass (Advanced)
attrs.description: sets the storageClass to something other than iX default. Only for advanced usecases!

attrs.label: Static Fixed PVC Bindings (Experimental)
attrs.description: Link a PVC to a specific storage location

attrs.label: mode
attrs.description:
disabled: use normal dynamic PVCs
smb: connect to an SMB share
nfs: connect to an NFS share

attrs.description: server to connect to

attrs.label: Share
attrs.description: share to connect to

attrs.description: connecting user

attrs.description: user domain

attrs.description: For use with PVCs using a non-default storageClass

attrs.description: Tells the DNAT mechanism which Destination IP to set in the IP header, and where to send packets that are matched.

attrs.description: The address on which to listen for SOCKS5 proxying into the tailscale net.

attrs.description: The address on which to listen for HTTP proxying into the tailscale net.

questions.label: Please read the documentation at https://truecharts.org
Please consider supporting TrueCharts, see https://truecharts.org/sponsor

3.0.0.app_readme:
Allows smart free video streaming in real time.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/incubator/restreamer

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
3.0.0.detailed_readme:
README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project
3.0.0.changelog:
Important: for the complete changelog, please refer to the website

restreamer-2.0.16 (2023-12-06)

restreamer-2.0.16 (2023-12-06)

restreamer-2.0.16 (2023-12-06)

restreamer-2.0.15 (2023-12-03)

Chore

  • bump everything to ensure catalog has latest versions

restreamer-2.0.14 (2023-12-02)

Chore

  • fix annotations again
  • update annotations
  • cleanup chart.yaml and add min-max scale version
  • Fix typo in categories and make them singular (#13693)

### Fix

  • ensure all questions.yaml can be rendered (#15612)

restreamer-3.0.0 (2023-07-31)

Feat

  • hide advanced ingress options behind checbox (#9203)

### Fix

  • fix mistakes on questions.yaml

restreamer-2.0.13 (2023-02-23)

Chore

  • update container image tccr.io/truecharts/restreamer to v2.5.0

restreamer-2.0.12 (2023-02-10)

Fix

  • ensure new helm deps repo is used in latest releases as well.

restreamer-2.0.11 (2023-02-02)

Fix

  • remove non-link sources (#6826)

restreamer-2.0.10 (2022-12-27)

Chore

  • update helm general non-major (#5856)

2.0.16.app_readme:
Allows smart free video streaming in real time.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/incubator/restreamer

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
2.0.16.detailed_readme:
README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project
